item.title: Jamdani Motif Generation using Conditional GAN
item.description: <!-- <iframe src="https://drive.google.com/file/d/19wqqS6zVL5eIgNhH9GmLTxC_TEAu6Q_Q/preview" width="720" height="920" allow="autoplay"></iframe> --> <iframe width="720" height="480" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/sZwqE2wFpFs" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>

item.title: Bengali Handwritten Character Recognition using Transfer Learning
item.description: We propose a solution which uses state-of-the-art techniques in Deep Learning to tackle the problem of Bengali Handwritten Character Recognition (HCR). Our method uses lesser iterations to train than most other comparable methods. We employ Transfer Learning on ResNet-50, a state-of-the-art deep Convolutional Neural Network Model, pretrained on ImageNet dataset.
